comments.body: I think this test will pass even without your change as you creating struct object using the same schema.
@bartektartanus Isn't that the purpose of this test? To create a scenario in which a struct and schema is passed to JsonConverter#convertToJson()?

Yes, but you are passing the same schema in the same OBJECT. So comparing them using == will return true. In my case the schema and schema in struct are the same (equal) but in different objects, co equals method returns true, but == returns false. 
While this test might be useful, it does not cover the change you are making here.
